Title: Face It, You're Gorgeous
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Nancy M. Pimental
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Frank employs Liam to help him chase down a romantic connection; Fiona struggles to keep up with the demands of her new investment as Ford pushes her to get serious about their relationship.
